name: ROGUE REPLICANT
description:
ROGUE REPLICANT

Play as a detective and uncover who the AI's are by asking characters questions in this Blade Runner inspired visual novel experience.

This game was made for a 1 week game jam with the theme of "AI". This project was made for education purposes only,  I did not make the character sprits used in the game & they are from the Danganronpa series, all credits go to the original character designers & artists.

P.S: There are two narratives in this game (one is more secret), I hop you find and enjoy both :)
